title: Introduction to Programming
description: Discover what programming is and why we need it

screens.end_comment: Exactly! Computers only understand binary - just 0s and 1s.

screens.prompt: Why do we need programming languages?
screens.end_comment: Right! Programming languages let us write instructions in a way that both humans and computers can work with.

dialogue.speaker: student
dialogue.text: So if I write code in Python, how does the computer understand it?

dialogue.speaker: teacher
dialogue.text: Great question! The computer uses a special program called an interpreter to translate your Python code into binary instructions it can execute.

screens.prompt: What translates Python code into binary?
screens.end_comment: Correct! Python uses an interpreter to translate your code line by line.

summary: ✅ Programming languages help us write human-readable instructions
✅ Python uses an interpreter to translate code to binary
